import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import './Review.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Review({ id, title, owner_id, yn_reply, review_title, modified_day, review_body, yn_visible }) { return (

{title}

{review_title}

    {owner_id}
    {id}

{review_body.slice(0, 2000)}...

{modified_day}
좋아요 자리
); } export function WriteReview({ content_id, owner_id, reply_id }) { return (
리뷰작성
); } /*
리뷰작성
function WriteReview({ content_id, owner_id, reply_id }) { return (

{title}

리뷰제목

    {owner_id}

내용

); } */ Review.propTypes = { id: PropTypes.number.isRequired, title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, review_title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, review_body: PropTypes.string.isRequired, }; export default Review;
